name: Tape me up
description:
Tape me up is a puzzle game that takes place on an old VHS tape. Your goal is to solve the puzzle by rewinding the videotape. Interact with levers, pressure plates and pieces of tape. Experience a small but intense adventure featuring 12 puzzles and an original and catchy soundtrack

Controls
  • A, D or Left and Right arrow to move the character or rewind the tape
  • W or Up Arrow to climb ladders
  • Space bar to interact with items
Resources
  • Made in Unity
  • Original assets created by Marco Giammetti
  • Original theme and jingles created by Caio Pedroso
  • Scripts and Level design by Francesco Breve and Giuliana Muto

Play. Have a good time. Let us know what you think!
